name: COVERAGE_TYPE_INDEMNITY
description: Type of indemnity coverage. Used when converting COB coverages to indemnity coverages.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INDEMNITY_COB_CVG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the coverage type for indemnity coverages that were converted from COB coverages.
